full_translation:
*The Primordial Vast Salvation of Humankind: Supreme and Wondrous Scripture with Phonetic Annotations*

**Scripture Title:** *The Primordial Vast Salvation of Humankind: Supreme and Wondrous Scripture with Phonetic Annotations*. Author unknown, transmitted from the northern tradition. This work provides phonetic glosses for archaic and difficult characters in the sixty-one-scroll edition of the *Scripture of Salvation*, facilitating recitation. One scroll.

**Source Text:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Benwen* Category.

---

chunks.translated_text:
*The Primordial Vast Salvation of Humankind: Supreme and Wondrous Scripture with Phonetic Annotations*

**Scripture Title:** *The Primordial Vast Salvation of Humankind: Supreme and Wondrous Scripture with Phonetic Annotations*. Author unknown, transmitted from the northern tradition. This work provides phonetic glosses for archaic and difficult characters in the sixty-one-scroll edition of the *Scripture of Salvation*, facilitating recitation. One scroll.

**Source Text:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Benwen* Category.

---
